// Recent Photo or Avatar // Short Biography import React from "react"; function About() { return (

Full Stack Developer

I'm Emily, a technical writer studying the full stack to better my work as a technical writer in the tech and SaaS fields.

• 2+ years of experience in developing web page and user interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, React JS, Webpack, JSON, Socket.io, MySQL, MongoDB, AJAX, DOM. • Expertise in developing front-end web applications using client-side JavaScript frameworks like handlebar. JS and React JS to achieve MVC design. • Experienced in developing applications using React JS for view rendering and implementing React JS with Redux and Flux to achieve MVC design flow to the application. • Experience in working with view rendering JavaScript like jQuery with AJAX to make asynchronous calls. • Experience in testing applications using Jest. JS. • Experience with relational databases like MySQL, and NoSQL like MongoDB. • Experience in implementing ORM technology like Sequelize for SQL, and Mongoose for NoSQL. • Knowledge in using Amazon Web Services (AWS) like EC2 for Virtual Servers to deploy applications, S3 and Glacier for storing data, Amazon Elastic Load Balancing, AWS Identity, Amazon EBS, Amazon SQS. • Experience in building bidirectional and low-latency communication platforms by using Socket.io.

); } export default About;
